user_management

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • user_management.User
      • user_management.PhysicalUser
        • user_management.Manager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Manager
extends PhysicalUser
implements java.io.Serializable
    Manager is a physical user of the system, it extends PhysicalUser. Manager has access to most of the functions of MyFoodora. A manager has a role, like "CEO".
    Author:
    maxspahn, jeremyaugot
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser(java.lang.String userName)
                throws UserNotFoundException

        Parameters:
        userName - The userName of the user to be removed.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException
